title: Karmabros
author: Karmabros
created_time: September 06, 2022, 07:18:49 AMLast edit: September 06, 2022, 07:36:19 AM by Karmabros
content: Hi,If you are looking to create your own blockchain project in web3 or use the advantage of crypto to raise funds I invite you to read the article I found on Rimo Digital.You can get more information about the potential of such a project and the difficulties you might encounter and even much more about this topic.Here is the article I recommend you read - https://rimo.digital/2022/08/16/how-to-create-a-cryptocurrency/I have worked in the past with www.rimo.digital who can provide excellent results and have some experience in this area.It's worth talking to them and seeing if they can support your project, the team are really good.

comments.author: Whiteness
comments.body: it is just an article on how to create a crypto currency. but it is not a proper guide and there is no technical details about how exactly create a token or crypto currency.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Whiteness on September 06, 2022, 08:37:58 AMit is just an article on how to create a crypto currency. but it is not a proper guide and there is no technical details about how exactly create a token or crypto currency. it (article) wasn't even intended to be particularly useful, nor is it a guide on "how to" anything, a bit of text for google search. This topic also is just created to make a backlink to OP's website.
